regexEvaluator.descriptionCdata: 99ea8c4e-132c-4083-9005-ecdb61c7780f.description=UUIDs (Universally Unique Identifiers) are 16-byte (128-bit) values represented as hexadecimal strings with 5 groups (separated by dashes, thus the width of a UUID string is 36 characters long).\n Example\: 46ff6812-11e4-42b9-9a18-da557cdf3eb0
regexEvaluator.name: uuid
